The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 December is 1,531,761 (2,721.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 05 December, there were 86,142 new confirmed cases (153.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 November, there were 87,921 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (1,779 fewer cases).
